original_text: Now the third day was Pharaoh’s birthday, and he gave a feast for all his officials. He lifted up the heads of the chief cupbearer and the chief baker in the presence of his officials:
korean_text: 제삼일은 바로의 생일이라 바로가 그의 모든 신하를 위하여 잔치를 베풀 때에 술 맡은 관원장과 떡 굽는 관원장에게 그의 신하들 중에 머리를 들게 하니라

sentences.original_text: Now the third day was Pharaoh's birthday
and he gave a feast for all his officials
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 관원들을 위해 잔치를 베풀었습니다

sentences.original_text: He lifted up the heads of the chief cupbearer
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 수석 관원장의 머리를 들게 했습니다

sentences.original_text: in the presence of his officials
